references.reason: This paper introduces Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs), which are a key concept bridged by DDO, and the method DDO tries to improve.
This paper is fundamental as it introduces diffusion models, one of the primary types of generative models that DDO enhances.
This paper introduces variational autoencoders, which are mentioned and relevant in the context of mode covering.
This paper introduces autoregressive models, another primary model improved by DDO.

references.paper_title: Training generative adversarial networks with limited data
references.reason: This paper focuses on GAN training, a competing model that the authors attempt to improve upon using the techniques they describe.
